name: @cypress/schematic
description: Official Cypress schematic for the Angular CLI

scripts.clean12: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox12 && git clean -f -d sandbox12
scripts.launch12: yarn link:sandbox12 && cd sandbox12 && ng add @cypress/schematic && cd ..
scripts.launch:test12: yarn link:sandbox12 && cd sandbox12 && ng add @cypress/schematic --e2eUpdate && cd ..
scripts.link:sandbox12: yarn link && cd sandbox12 && yarn link @cypress/schematic
scripts.clean14: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox14 && git clean -f -d sandbox14
scripts.launch14: yarn link:sandbox14 && cd sandbox14 && ng add @cypress/schematic && cd ..
scripts.launch:test14: yarn link:sandbox14 && cd sandbox14 && ng add @cypress/schematic --e2eUpdate && cd ..
scripts.link:sandbox14: yarn link && cd sandbox14 && yarn link @cypress/schematic
scripts.unlink:sandbox12: cd sandbox12 && yarn unlink @cypress/schematic && cd .. && yarn unlink
scripts.unlink:sandbox14: cd sandbox14 && yarn unlink @cypress/schematic && cd .. && yarn unlink

author: Cypress DX Team
